destinations.name: Cairo
destinations.description: The capital city of Egypt, known for its rich history and landmarks.

activities.Name: Visit the Pyramids
activities.Cost: riding horse will cost you 200 pound
activities.Way_to_go: You can take the metro to EL-haram station this will cost from 6 to 15 pound and then a taxi from the metro to the pyramids and this will cost from 50 to 100 pound

activities.Name: Explore the Egyptian Museum
activities.Cost: the ticket will cost you 50 pound
activities.Way_to_go: You can take the metro to EL-Sadat station this will cost from 6 to 15 pound and then you will walk about 50 metre to the  museum

activities.Name: Nile River Cruise
activities.Way_to_go: You can take the metro to EL-Sadat station this will cost from 6 to 15 pound and then take a taxi to the nile river and this will cost from 30 to 60 pound

destinations.name: Luxor
destinations.description: Known as the 'world's greatest open-air museum', Luxor is home to ancient temples and monuments.

activities.Name: Visit Karnak Temple
activities.Cost: the ticket will cost you 50 pound
activities.Way_to_go: you can take a taxi that cost from 100 to 200 pound

activities.Name: Explore Valley of the Kings
activities.Cost: the ticket will cost you 70 pound
activities.Way_to_go: you can take a taxi that cost from 100 to 200 pound

activities.Name: Hot Air Balloon Ride
activities.Cost: the ride will cost you 40 pound
activities.Way_to_go: you can take a taxi that cost from 70 to 160 pound

destinations.name: Sharm El Sheikh
destinations.description: A popular resort destination on the Red Sea, known for its coral reefs and vibrant marine life.

activities.Name: Snorkeling
activities.Way_to_go: you will found snorkeling in each beach

activities.Name: Diving
activities.Way_to_go: you can Book a diving excursion in any beach

activities.Name: Relaxing on the Beach
activities.Cost: the ticket of beaches cost from 100 to 200 pound

destinations.name: Alexandria
destinations.description: A coastal city with a rich history, known for its ancient library and historic sites.

activities.Name: Visit Bibliotheca Alexandrina
activities.Cost: the ticket will cost you 20 pound
activities.Way_to_go: You can take the tramway to el gamaa station this will cost from 5 to 10 pound and then you will walk about 700 metre to the  Bibliotheca

activities.Name: Explore Qaitbay Citadel
activities.Cost: the ticket will cost you 50 pound
activities.Way_to_go: You can take the tramway to halaet el samak station this will cost from 5 to 10 pound and then you will walk about 500 metre to the  citadel

activities.Name: Explore Royal Jewelry Museum
activities.Cost: the ticket will cost you 70 pound
activities.Way_to_go: You can take the tramway to gelem station this will cost from 5 to 10 pound and then you will walk about 400 metre to the  museum

destinations.name: Aswan
destinations.description: A picturesque city along the Nile River, famous for its ancient temples and Nubian culture.

activities.Name: Visit Abu Simbel
activities.Cost: the ticket will cost you 50 pound
activities.Way_to_go: you can take a taxi that cost from 100 to 200 pound

activities.Name: Nile Felucca Cruise
activities.Way_to_go: you can take a taxi that cost from 50 to 100 pound

activities.Name: Explore Philae Temple
activities.Cost: the ticket will cost you 70 pound
activities.Way_to_go: you can take a taxi that cost from 150 to 200 pound

destinations.name: Dahab
destinations.description: A laid-back coastal town on the Sinai Peninsula, known for its beaches and water sports.

activities.Name: Windsurfing
activities.Way_to_go: you can take a car that cost from 100 to 200 pound

activities.Name: Camel Safari
activities.Way_to_go: you can take a car that cost from 200 to 250 pound

activities.Name: Blue Hole Diving
activities.Way_to_go: you can take a car that cost from 150 to 200 pound

tour_packages.name: Historical Cairo Tour
tour_packages.description: Discover the historical treasures of Cairo.

tour_packages.name: Nile Discovery Tour
tour_packages.description: Experience the magic of Luxor and a Nile River cruise.

tour_packages.name: Red Sea Adventure
tour_packages.description: Discover the underwater wonders of Sharm El Sheikh with snorkeling and diving excursions.

tour_packages.name: Alexandria Cultural Tour
tour_packages.description: Immerse yourself in the history and culture of Alexandria's iconic landmarks.

tour_packages.name: Nubian Adventure
tour_packages.description: Explore the wonders of Aswan, including the majestic Abu Simbel temples and a Nile felucca cruise.

tour_packages.name: Sinai Beach Retreat
tour_packages.description: Experience the tranquility of Dahab with water sports, camel safaris, and diving in the famous Blue Hole.
